definitions.text: an aromatic gum resin obtained from various Arabian or East African trees; formerly valued for worship and for embalming and fumigation
(used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result
examples: the eggs were fresh and hence satisfactory
we were young and thence optimistic
it is late and thus we must go
the witness is biased and so cannot be trusted

definitions.text: in the way indicated; ; ; (`thusly' is a nonstandard variant)
